textAfterTable: Posted 11:59am on Tue 27 August 2013 pblive PATRON Posts: 19,646 0 0 In response to Topic But the difference between PC and next-gen versions "won't be night and day", developer assures. Read News » Go to VG_Staff's original post But it will only look better on a very high end PC. There's a huge difference between a budget PC, a medium level PC and a high end PC and even between different high end PCs, so it would be interesting to see what sort of setup was playing at E3 and what you'd expect from an average PC spec. 4D Gamers.com - Gaming, but not as we know it.
